document_data.name: Gist
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gist''' family was one of the noble [[patriar families]] of [[Baldur's Gate]]. They owed their wealth to their ownership of the majority of the city's production of [[dye]]s.
document_data.Members:
*[[Felonius Gist]], the 14{{th}} century art dealer, who once purchased six stone statues that were in fact [[petrified]] [[adventurer]]s.
*[[Haverford Gist]], a charitable nobleman in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
*[[Leander Gist]], a patriar from the late 15{{th}} century DR.
